analysis.key_quote: The reclassification of the career civil service employees who participate in the development of funding announcements and oversee the review of grant applications as Schedule F would politicize the NIH, harm public trust in Federally-funded science research, and limit our ability to identify future cures and treat existing illnesses that have or will impact every single American
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of the NIH and its negative impact on public trust and scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
